name: Treasure Arena
description:
Treasure Arena is an online battle-arena for up to 4 players.

  • Loot various weapons like bows, rockets, bombs, and more!
  • Survive enemy attacks by jumping, dodging and blocking!
  • Collect the most coins to win the game!

Controls:

  • Move: WASD or Arrow keys
  • Jump: Space
  • Run/Dodge: Double tap direction
  • Attack: Left click
  • Block: Right click (when holding a shield)
  • Switch weapons: Number keys or mouse wheel
  • Special Class Ability: Shift (when skill meter is full)
